TopicTitle: RSS Time vs Kerbal Time setting

Articles.Content:
I think my RSS install is still using Kerbal time.. where does one set it to 'Real Time'.

I set a solar orbit passing Venus, and notice that the estimated time to the other apsis is 1yr 200 days or so... when it should be less than 180 days

Thanks for any help

![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
Main menu->settings. Choose "Earth Time". It's stock.

Ohh! I see..![:blush:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_embarrassed.gif)

Thanks... ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

edt: this is probably it.. in the settings.cfg file

**KERBIN\_TIME = True** (False => Earth time)
